properties.displayName: Use Icacls to Hide File to Everyone
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "/deny" and ProcessCommandLine contains "S-1-1-0:") and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "iCACLS.EXE" or FolderPath endswith "\\icacls.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detect use of icacls to deny access for everyone in Users folder sometimes used to hide malicious files
